name: One Hell of a Coffee Shop
name_original: One Hell of a Coffee Shop
description:
Good morning! May I take your order?

One Hell of a Coffee Shop is a short, kinetic Visual Novel where you get to order some surely overpriced coffee at your friendly neighborhood coffee shop and have a chat with its barista!

The game was made for the O2A2 (Again!) Game Jam and features:

  • one background
  • one sprite
  • one thousand words
  • one music track

But why stop there? Therefore, it also features:

  • one plot twist!
  • one meta narrative!
  • one obnoxiously long coffee order joke!
  • and one reference to Genesis 1:1! 

So, what are you waiting for? Go get a virtual coffee today! 

And we are: 

  • mossinasi, artist and programmer | itch | twitter
  • mlkrn, writer | itch | twitter
  • cygni, editor | itch | twitter
  • TSotoMusic, composer | website | twitter
[Hint] Are you stuck? If you played the game and didn't find any of the good stuff promised in the description, try to replay it. If you are still stuck: This is a looped VN incorporating the persistent save file mechanic. You are supposed to replay it several times until the credits roll. After that, the button in the main menu changes from "Enter" to "Restart".
